backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining health monitoring data types (HealthMetric, MovementAnomaly, AlarmEvent) and providing public functions to add/retrieve health metrics, movement anomalies, and alarm events with time-range filtering.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three implemented features: Internet Identity login page, Bluetooth connection UI controls, and Web Bluetooth API integration with associated files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-existing summaries of frontend TypeScript/React components covering authentication, Bluetooth integration, health dashboards, charts, alarms, and utility functions.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes using OKLCH color space, defining design tokens for backgrounds, borders, charts, and sidebar components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vital Monitor application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication flow, displaying LoginPage for unauthenticated users or the main health dashboard with alarms, metrics, anomalies, and trends for authenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AlarmCard.tsx: Component rendering a single critical alarm alert with message, timestamp, and dismiss button using destructive styling.
frontend/src/components/AlarmHistoryView: Full-page view displaying all alarm events sorted by timestamp with back navigation and empty state handling.
frontend/src/components/AlarmNotificatio: Section displaying active alarms with count badge and toggle to view alarm history, hiding when no active alarms exist.
List item component for movement anomalies with description, timestamp, and visual highlighting for recent events.
frontend/src/components/BloodPressureCar: Card displaying blood pressure readings (systolic/diastolic) with color-coded status badge based on standard BP ranges and formatted timestamp.
frontend/src/components/BloodPressureCha: Renders a line chart displaying systolic and diastolic blood pressure trends over time using Recharts, with reference lines at 120/80 and formatted timestamps.
frontend/src/components/BluetoothConnect: Provides a button with popover UI for connecting/disconnecting Bluetooth health monitoring devices, displaying connection status, device info, and error messages.
frontend/src/components/DateRangeSelecto: A dropdown select component for choosing time ranges (24h, 7d, 30d) to filter health metric data.
Main dashboard component that displays current vital signs (heart rate, blood pressure, hypertension risk) from the latest health metric, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/HealthTrendsView: Displays historical health trends with date range filtering, showing heart rate and blood pressure charts side-by-side in a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/HeartRateCard.ts: Card component displaying current heart rate in BPM with status badge (Low/Normal/Elevated/High) and last update timestamp.
frontend/src/components/HeartRateChart.t: Renders a line chart showing heart rate trends over time with reference lines at 60 and 100 BPM using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/HypertensionRisk: Card component that displays an alert indicating whether hypertension risk is detected based on blood pressure readings.
frontend/src/components/LoginPage.tsx: Landing page with Internet Identity authentication, displaying app features and a login button with status feedback.
frontend/src/components/MovementAnomalyS: Displays a section showing movement anomalies with loading states, error handling, and filtering for recent anomalies within the last hour. Renders anomalies in a card with an icon and uses AnomalyListItem components for each entry.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: Provides the main application layout with a sticky header containing the app title and Bluetooth/sign-out buttons, a main content area, and a footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAlarmEvents.ts: Manages alarm events with localStorage-based dismissal tracking, filtering out dismissed alarms from the active list and providing a dismissAlarm function.
frontend/src/hooks/useBluetooth.ts: Provides Web Bluetooth API integration for connecting to Bluetooth devices with support for heart rate, battery, and device information services, including connection state management and error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useHealthMetrics.ts: Simple wrapper hook that calls useHealthMetricsQuery with a provided or default date range of 24 hours.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for managing user login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validation using DFINITY's AuthClient.
Simple wrapper hook that calls useMovementAnomaliesQuery with a default date range of 7 days.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching health metrics, movement anomalies, and alarm events from the backend actor with configurable date ranges and automatic polling intervals.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with a medical-themed color palette using soft greens, health status colors (normal/warning/critical), and custom design tokens for both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/src/types/bluetooth.d.ts: TypeScript type declarations for the Web Bluetooth API, defining interfaces for Bluetooth devices, GATT servers, services, characteristics, and navigator integration.
frontend/src/utils/timeUtils.ts: Utility functions for converting between JavaScript milliseconds and IC nanosecond timestamps, formatting timestamps for display and charts, and calculating date ranges for queries.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, health-specific colors, extended theme settings, and animation keyframes for UI components.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking the health monitoring app's features including authentication, Bluetooth connectivity, 2-minute interval recording, and CSV export functionality with pending feature requests.
